items.text: punched off the backfoot to mid-off
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: good length on middle, defended
items.shortText: Bumrah to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: fullish, angled into off, pushed through the covers
items.shortText: Bumrah to Mosaddek Hossain, 1 run

items.text: good length on off, plays late to point
items.shortText: Bumrah to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: just back of a length, very accurate on off, defended solidly
items.shortText: Bumrah to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: full, clipped with the angle between midwicket and mid-on. They push back for the second and Kedar's throw misses the stumps. Direct hit may have made things more interesting
items.shortText: Bumrah to Mahmudullah, 2 runs

items.text: punched off the backfoot to point
items.postText: No wicket in 12 overs, but hardly much progress - just 25 runs added off them. Back to Al.
items.shortText: Bumrah to Mahmudullah, no run

items.preText: Right then 30 overs done, Bangladesh have not scored off 20 of them - 121 dots and counting
items.text: steps away from his crease and ends up dragging the googly from outside off to long-on
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Mosaddek Hossain, 1 run

items.text: loops it up on off stump, defends
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: tosses it up on off stump - it's the legbreak - Mahmudullah pushes it to cover
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: unleashes a reverse sweep - it looks premeditated, the result of the pressure he's under - and he's lucky that this ball is quick and flat from Kuldeep. It gives him all the pace he needs to find the third man boundary
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Mahmudullah, FOUR runs

items.text: that's lovely! It's another flatter delivery from the wristpsinner and Mahmudllah rocks back, and away from the line, and slams the ball through the cover field
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Mahmudullah, FOUR runs

items.text: rips in from off stump to strikes his pads but there's precious little excitement from the keeper or the bowler. Spinning too much, perhaps
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: presses forward and drives to cover
items.shortText: Jadeja to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: spears it into middle and leg, Mosaddek pushes it back at the bowler
items.shortText: Jadeja to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: opens the face against a flighted ball on middle but can't beat cover
items.shortText: Jadeja to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: slower through the air this time and Mosaddek ventures forward to blunt it
items.postText: saikot: "@Ramesh, It might be common in 80s, but not in this condition when you have temperature of 45 degrees and extremely humid. Its nor just another day in the office. Its a big tournament and you have to have your time to settle down a bit to rethink your strategies."
items.shortText: Jadeja to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: slides it into the pads and hits his target. Jadeja belts out an lbw appeal, but there's an inside edge playing spoilsport
items.shortText: Jadeja to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: pokes it into the covers for a quick single. Only one run off the Jadeja over
items.postText: Saurabh: "Why is that Indian bowlers always struggle to get the lower order all rounders' wickets? First Sam Curran in entire England series now today Mahmudullah looking dangerous!"
items.shortText: Jadeja to Mosaddek Hossain, 1 run

items.text: steps down the pitch but finds the ball getting big on him. Mistimed push to cover
items.shortText: Kumar to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: beats him as he attempts a late cut. A little inward movement off the pitch for Bhuvi
items.shortText: Kumar to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: opens the face to send a back of a length ball to deep third man
items.postText: Snehil: "This is test cricket at it's best. Oops, just jet-lagged from the IND-ENG series."
items.shortText: Kumar to Mosaddek Hossain, 1 run

items.text: dabs a shortish delivery outside off to point
items.postText: Hari: "Oh Saurabh! It's gonna hurt Mahmudullah if he hears being called a lower order all-rounder.. He's much better than that.."
items.shortText: Kumar to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: gives him out lbw, Mahmudullah wants to review, but Bangladesh have already used theirs up and so their last specialist batsman has to go even though he's got a big inside edge onto pad. All this trouble is caused by a skidder from Bhuvi, pitching on off stump and zipping through to hit Mahmudullah on the back thigh. Umpire Brathwaite believes it's plumb and raises the finger immediately
items.postText: Gopal: "Ways to make this match's stats interesting #42: India bowled 158 dot balls vs Pakistan. Can they beat the number in this match before Bangladesh gets bowled out? 133 and counting.."
items.shortText: Kumar to Mahmudullah, OUT

items.text: full and outside off, Mashrafe blocks
items.shortText: Kumar to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run
